entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Profile and performance test Diagnostics middleware #42700
    7.0-rc1
  • Issue running .net6.0 (arm64) under IIS on Windows 11 ARM64 - missing version '6.0.o' (arm64) #42699
  • Stop overriding compiler version in versions.props #42698
    7.0-rc1
  • Requests with new lines at the end cause extra 400 responses #42697
    6.0.x
  • Migration strategy with abstraction from ASP.NET webapi to ASP.NET Core #42696
  • IJSRuntime in documentation #42693
  • Make BrowserFile testable #42690
  • Add "readDoubleField", "readByteField", ... to Blazor #42687
  • Add support for EventCallback using JSInterop #42686
  • "The path must be absolute" when running Blazor.Server in Linux docker #42684
  • failed to start process with commandline #42680
  • Trim warnings from components assemblies #42676
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • Additional Extensibility of `CreateHandler()` on `TestServer` #42567
    7.0-preview7
  • [Route Groups] Support AddFilter, WithOpenApi and other additive conventions #41427
    7.0-preview6
  • Rename filter extension methods and type name to be more agnostic #42589
    7.0-preview7
  • Support Multiple PartitionedRateLimiter Per Endpoint #42691
  • How to invoke (ValueChanged) callback and EditContext.NotifyFieldChanged from JSInterop? #34703
    Backlog
  • Consider adding Text overloads to support UTF8 text #41919
    7.0-preview7

PullRequests

Created

  • Tests for DisallowConfigureServices Analyzer #42702
    area-infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #42695
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.28
  • Javiercn/dynamic authentication requests #42692
  • Updated documentation for ASP.NET Identity Community Providers #42689
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • HTTP/3: Avoid per-request cancellation token allocations #42685
    area-runtime
  • HTTP/3: Don't wait for writes to complete in sends #42683
    area-runtime
  • Update branding to 7.0.0-rc1 #42682
    area-infrastructure
  • HTTP/3: Add end-to-end test for stream and header reuse #42681
    area-runtime
  • Support loading OIDC options from configuration #42679
    area-security, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Add `CreateHandler` method that allows additonal configuration #42677
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview7
  • Make RateLimitingMiddleware endpoint aware #42417
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #42694
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.IIS from 2.2.0 to 2.2.6 in /src/Servers/IIS/IIS/test/testassets/InProcessNewShimWebSite #42624
    area-runtime, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, .NET, 7.0-preview7
  • Rename RouteHandlerFilter to EndpointFilter #42678
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview7
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1875191 #42636
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview7
  • Reuse Http3MessageBody #42648
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • Add utf8 text overloads for creating results #42595
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7

Updated

  • Allow cancellation of navigation events in Blazor #42638
    area-blazor
  • Efficiently buffer to disk #42672
    area-runtime
  • Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • Route tooling #42597
    area-web-frameworks
  • Improve Default Blazor WebAssembly Loading Experience #42548
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview7
  • Adding ProblemDetailsService #42384
    area-web-frameworks
  • Implement code fixer to change the code from calling Configure methods to using builder.Configuration #42630
    area-web-frameworks
  • Http Response fails when writing more than 255MB #41239
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [SignalR] [.NET Client] Retry HTTP request on auth failure #42671
    area-signalr
  • Introduce per-HealthCheck periodicity #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Trim identity #42675
    area-identity
  • Allow to bind StringValues for optional HTTP requests params with Minimal APIs #41789
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Make route handler filters work for MVC controllers #42557
    area-mvc
  • [Migrated] - Generate Composite Images Redistributable #42506
    area-infrastructure
